description: This file defines the main page component of a notes application, utilizing React and Next.js. It manages the state and interactions for displaying, creating, updating, and deleting notes, coordinating various child components like sidebar, header, list, and modal.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the notes application page, handling state and user interactions.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selecting a note and opens the modal to view/edit.

methods.name: handleNewNote
methods.description: Prepares the UI for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleSaveNote
methods.description: Saves a note (creates or updates) and updates the notes list.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note and updates the UI accordingly.
